description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. Daylight City is no longer safe. With the sudden appearance of crazed gangs and strange monsters a small group of civilians take refuge inside a military bunker, but are they safe...  Enjoy the debut Visual Novel by Black Ball.
